document.full_text: sweden's rikard karlberg will go into the third round of the andalucia open in a three-way tie for the lead and hoping to erase a rule blunder which had prevented him getting his 2011 european tour card.
document.title: joint leader karlberg aims to make up for tour card blunder
lines_and_colors: sweden's rikard karlberg will go into the third round of the andalucia open in a three-way tie for the lead and hoping to erase a rule blunder which had prevented him getting his 2011 european tour card.
